name: Eleanor Bishop
description: A seasoned detective who specializes in uncovering hidden truths about the eldritch horrors lurking in the shadows.

name: Raymond Carter
description: A sharp-witted detective known for his tenacity and relentless pursuit of the truth, even when it leads to unspeakable horrors.

name: Margaret Holloway
description: A brilliant doctor of the mind, drawn into the dark underbelly of the supernatural while treating patients tormented by otherworldly forces.
